title: Illaoi, the Kraken Priestess, available now

replies.body: Fake bruh, I've seen this so many times, in that exact sentence as well

great work riot, releasing a one hitting un-killable piece of sh*t onto the poor league community. why do you do this to me. illaoi 1v5'd three times and killed my entire team on 40 health, please fix your shit riot. and please, dont start with the "maybe she outplayed you", or "your bad" cause shes f*cked, no two ways about it.
he looks pretty mint but wait till he gets nerfed its gonna hurt him so bad xD
All I ask is for URF mode please.
FUCKK RIOT SHE IS BROKEN AS SHITT AND SHE DESTROYS ALL MY MAINS. HOW AM I MEANT TO ENJOY LEAGUE NOW??
please fix this, she is utter bullshit. same farm, same score (0/0/0) poking me to hell, gets a 3 man gank under my tower and she wipes us all. GG well played rito.
NERF LIKE EKKO AND STUFF PLS {{item:3070}}
rito why you releasing everything early this patch? XD
the new hero suck.i want to break my pc after my game.
